text:
variables, we can deﬁne a multi-step time-series forecasting model. Any of the presented LSTM
model types could be used, such as Vanilla, Stacked, Bidirectional, CNN-LSTM, or ConvLSTM.
Below deﬁnes a Stacked LSTM for multi-step forecasting.
# define model
model = Sequential()
model.add(LSTM(100, activation=' relu' , return_sequences=True, input_shape=(n_steps_in,
n_features)))
model.add(LSTM(100, activation=' relu' ))
model.add(Dense(n_steps_out))
model.compile(optimizer=' adam' , loss=' mse' )
